text: The first application for a patent for Meccano was submitted. Known at first as "Mechanics Made Easy," this invention of Frank Hornby became a worldwide success and is sold in the US under the name "Erector Set"
Apple CEO John Sculley coined the term Personal Digital Assistants, or PDAs, and indicated Apple would get into the business of making them later that year.
Apple introduced iTunes for the Macintosh, featuring CD ripping, digital music organizing, and Internet radio.
Apple CEO Steve Jobs introduced an iPod, an Internet device and a phone all in one. It was called the iPhone and would go on sale later that summer. It was pretty popular at the time.
